name: Unlocking the File Vault
description:
Unlocking the FIle Vault ist my first ever game jam game and my first game after many years of not working on any games. I'm still quite new to this so please don't be to harsh with your critical feedback - constructive feedback is welcome though. I know that the game is quite short and that there's a small floating gltich when placing objects onto eachother (like sender unit onto a box but I may keep working on the online version of the game after the jam (which will of course not affect the downloadable Windows verson submitted here.

How to play

Download the zip file on Windows, untip it, cklick into "bin" and then on the file that hase the name of the game. Alternatively you can play it online here.

Relating to the theme

Only when the sender unit and the lock unit are joined together via a successfully sent and recieved data package, the next level is made available.
